text:
Join Handshake (http://www.joinhandshake.com) is hiring.

We are the fastest growing career services platform in the country, helping colleges and employers actively engage students with personalized opportunities.

Over 110 universities (including Stanford, Princeton, Berkeley, Cornell, Rice), 100,000 recruiters, and 2 million students use our platform. Our business is expanding across multiple states, and we're looking for developers in SF.

Hiring for:

-Full stack developers (we're a RoR shop but open to all types of software engineering backgrounds): http://grnh.se/y3vipr -Front-end developers: http://grnh.se/euci80 -QA Engineer Lead: http://grnh.se/64irse -Product (UI/UX) Designer (experienced): http://grnh.se/1d650y

Not seeing a role that fits? We have more positions, just check out our careers page: https://joinhandshake.com/careers/

Alternatively, you can email me if you have questions: mike@joinhandshake.com
